para.text: A person becomes a general partner:
Upon formation of a limited partnership, as agreed among the persons that are to be the initial partners; and
As provided in the partnership agreement;
Under § 29-708.01(3)(B) following the dissociation of a limited partnership’s last general partner;
As the result of a merger under subchapter X of this chapter or a transaction under Chapter 2 of this title; or
With the consent of all the partners.
As the result of a merger under subchapter X of this chapter or a transaction under Chapter 2 of this title; or
With the consent of all the partners.
A person may become a general partner without:
Making or being obligated to make a contribution to the partnership.

annotations.annotation: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-210 added the (a) designation; rewrote (a)(1) and (a)(2); and added (b).
annotations.text: Application of Law 19-210: Section 7 of D.C. Law 19-210 provided that the act shall apply as of January 1, 2012.
Uniform Law: This section is based on § 401 of the Uniform Limited Partnership Act (2001 Act).
